body: Find out more about the content of the "Identity" module of the Kentico MVC for Developers course
pageBody: Find out more about the content of the "Identity" module of the Kentico MVC for Developers course

body: Find out how Kentico supports user management and what built-in options you can use to make sure every user has access to features they need to work on your website.
pageBody: Find out how Kentico supports user management and what built-in options you can use to make sure every user has access to features they need to work on your website.

body: Find out which Kentico objects create a flexible security model that allows you to configure granular access permissions for pages and applications in the administration interface.
pageBody: Find out which Kentico objects create a flexible security model that allows you to configure granular access permissions for pages and applications in the administration interface.

body: Learn about general recommendations  that help you create user-friendly but secured applications.
pageBody: Learn about general recommendations  that help you create user-friendly but secured applications.

body: Learn  about global and site-specific roles and other interesting tips about working with users in Kentico
pageBody: Learn  about global and site-specific roles and other interesting tips about working with users in Kentico
displayTitle: Additional information about managing users in Kentico administration

body: Unleash the power of ASP.NET MVC and ASP.NET Identity in Kentico MVC projects. Learn about the architecture of ASP.NET Identity and Kentico’s support for it.
pageBody: Unleash the power of ASP.NET MVC and ASP.NET Identity in Kentico MVC projects. Learn about the architecture of ASP.NET Identity and Kentico’s support for it.

body: Get acquainted with the work you’ll do in the practical part of this course module.
pageBody: Get acquainted with the work you’ll do in the practical part of this course module.
displayTitle: Kentico MVC Identity: Scope of delivery

body: Establish the solution architecture with the foundation classes.
pageBody: Establish the solution architecture with the foundation classes.

body: Implement the Identity-based infrastructure with the help of the classes introduced in the Kentico 12.0.34 hotfix.
pageBody: Implement the Identity-based infrastructure with the help of the classes introduced in the Kentico 12.0.34 hotfix.

body: Implement the Identity-based infrastructure in a way that doesn't require you to apply the Kentico 12.0.34 hotfix.
pageBody: Implement the Identity-based infrastructure in a way that doesn't require you to apply the Kentico 12.0.34 hotfix.

body: Avoid mixing two distinct methods of supplying dependencies in your project by replacing the default lifecycle management method with DI.
pageBody: Avoid mixing two distinct methods of supplying dependencies in your project by replacing the default lifecycle management method with DI.

body: Get your project to the next level of flexibility by building services and types used throughout the rest of the implementation process.
pageBody: Get your project to the next level of flexibility by building services and types used throughout the rest of the implementation process.

body: Create common basic code that powers the managers and controllers.
pageBody: Create common basic code that powers the managers and controllers.

body: Create code that the future account manager directly builds upon.
pageBody: Create code that the future account manager directly builds upon.

body: Create a class that acts as an engine behind all account-related tasks.
pageBody: Create a class that acts as an engine behind all account-related tasks.

body: After a long path through the lower-level code, finally implement all MVC bits and pieces to make the registration, sign-in, sign-out, and password reset happen.
pageBody: After a long path through the lower-level code, finally implement all MVC bits and pieces to make the registration, sign-in, sign-out, and password reset happen.

body: Let patients and doctors edit their profile information through a secured page.
pageBody: Let patients and doctors edit their profile information through a secured page.

body: Create another powerful engine in your solution, the profile manager.
pageBody: Create another powerful engine in your solution, the profile manager.

body: Enrich your profile page experience with user avatar pictures.
pageBody: Enrich your profile page experience with user avatar pictures.

body: Finish the user profile page story by creating the UI code.
pageBody: Finish the user profile page story by creating the UI code.

body: Congratulations on the completion of the course module!
pageBody: Congratulations on the completion of the course module!
